column4: UPDATE 3-Tesla's Musk sees 'modest' capital raise for next strategic turn
column5: SPARKS  Nevada  July 26 Tesla Motors Inc's  next strategic turn could cost the electric car maker "tens of billions" of dollars over the long term  but will likely require only a "modest" capital raise  Chief Executive Elon Musk said on Tuesday.

column5: * Lear will be including Qualcomm Halo WEVC technology in its product portfolio

column4: Qualcomm to pay $19.5 mln to settle gender discrimination class action
column5: Qualcomm Inc has agreed to pay $19.5 million to settle a proposed gender bias class action accusing the San Diego-based chip manufacturer of failing to give 3 300 female employees the same pay and promotion opportunities as their male colleagues.
